title: kUDi vAzhuvOm kuvalayam
sahitya:
kUDi vAzhuvOm kuvalayamellAm kula deivam onrE kulavuyirum onrE


anupallavi

  nADu nira jAti matha bhEdamellAm nAnAvikAramAna manamE


caraNam    kOyilum stUpiyum kottan vElaiyE gurukkaLum shilaiyum varukkak-koLgaiyE
nEyamuTri uLLE tUya onraik-kaNDAl niraivAna anbAl kuraiyinri ingE
